item.title: AI risks 'broken' career ladder for college graduates, some experts say
item.description: Advances of AI chatbots like ChatGPT heighten concern, experts say.

item.title: Hiring slowed in May as Trump's tariffs fluctuated
item.description: The job market has proven resilient as firms warn of uncertainty tied to tariffs.

item.title: Musk agreed with calls for Trump's impeachment amid explosive feud
item.description: President Trump and Elon Musk's rift exploded into public view on Thursday over what started out as differences on the president's megabill.

item.title: From key adviser to bitter feud: A timeline of Musk and Trump's relationship
item.description: Once a key member of President Donald Trump's inner circle, Elon Musk's relationship with the president has deteriorated into a bitter public feud.

item.title: Trump tells ABC Musk 'lost his mind'; 'not particularly' interested in talking to him
item.description: He spoke with ABC News Chief Washington Correspondent Jonathan Karl.
